[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” desctop_mb=”margin-lg-135b” tablets_mb=”margin-sm-100b”][vc_column][vc_banner_title color_style=”light” subtitle=” INTERIOR” title=”Stone Krow House” img=”1335″ enable_overlay=”true” enable_fullheight=”true” columns=”%5B%7B%7D%5D”][/vc_banner_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mb=”margin-lg-135b” tablets_mb=”margin-sm-100b”][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_headings subtitle=”ENVIRONMENT” title=”Black&Bricks” css=”.vc_custom_1500907974494{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;}”]Main goal for this project was to create highly aesthetic images of a beautiful living space for promotional purposes. The art direction for those interiors was to create Scandinavian interiors with its very characteristic dark interiors combining functionality with minimalism.

Designers, iconic furniture was used to achieve elegant, sophisticated look.[/vc_headings][vc_info_block items=”%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22LOCATION%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20York%2C%20USA%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22CREATIVE%20DIRECTOR%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Andrus’%20Bezden%22%7D%5D”][vc_share_buttons facebook=”true” twitter=”true” linkedin=”true” pinterest=”true” title=”SHARE PROJECT”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”7/12″ mobile_mt=”margin-xs-50t”][vc_single_image image=”1346″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1500907480478{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”1345″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1500907487669{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”1344″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1500907560123{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”1343″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
